display_information.name: Message Remover Bot
display_information.description: Delete messages and replies via right-click or slash commands. Silent operation for admins and users.
display_information.long_description: This bot provides comprehensive message management capabilities for Slack workspaces. Administrators can delete messages from any user, while regular users can delete their own messages. Features include: (1) Right-click shortcut for individual message deletion, (2) /remove-messages slash command for time-based bulk deletion with flexible formats (1H, 2D, 30M, etc.), (3) Automatic deletion of message replies, (4) Silent operation without confirmation messages, and (5) Smart permission handling with user token support.

slash_commands.description: Remove orphaned messages from a time period

shortcuts.name: Remove Message & Replies
shortcuts.description: Silently remove this message and all its replies
